markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Tlehar (The Rising Sun)](/Deities.aspx?ID=217)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Any deity that would grant the dreaming potential spell as a domain spell instead grants cloak of colors._

The Lioness Goddess of iron, love, and rebirth. She is most commonly depicted as human but with the head of a lioness, her fur a dull gray and her eyes black as night.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Old Sun Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=19)

**Edicts** give yourself fully to everything you attempt, always maintain hope that tomorrow will be a better day, treasure every gift you are given by those who matter to you

**Anathema** lose your motivation to your regrets, spread despair, treat a loved one poorly

**Area of Concern**
iron, love, and rebirth

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Favored Weapon** [Morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=3), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104)

- **5th**
[Dreaming Potential](/Spells.aspx?ID=91)

</column>
name: Tlehar (The Rising Sun)
